file_insights.changes: Added Team Members navigation link with GroupIcon
details: Added new NavItem object to mainNavItems array with label 'Team Members', path '/team-members', and GroupIcon
Maintains consistency with existing navigation item structure

patterns_discovered.description: Adding new sidebar navigation items follows a consistent pattern: import icon component, define NavItem object with label/path/icon properties
patterns_discovered.evidence: New Team Members item follows same structure as Dashboard and Projects items

patterns_discovered.description: Navigation icons are sourced from @mui/icons-material library with semantic icon selection
patterns_discovered.evidence: GroupIcon selected for Team Members - semantically appropriate for representing team/people concept

patterns_discovered.description: Navigation paths use kebab-case format matching the route structure

gotchas_discovered.issue: Icon import must be added separately
gotchas_discovered.description: Each new navigation item requires a dedicated import statement for its icon component
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Follow the import pattern established at top of file

gotchas_discovered.issue: Array ordering matters for UI display
gotchas_discovered.description: Position in mainNavItems array determines display order in sidebar
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Team Members placed after Projects - verify if intended ordering or if should be different

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully added Team Members navigation link to sidebar with minimal, focused changes
approach_outcome.details: Single file modification adding one import and one navigation item definition. Changes are atomic and focused on the specific requirement.

recommendations.suggestion: Verify that /team-members route exists in the application router
recommendations.rationale: Navigation link points to /team-members path - if route doesn't exist, clicking link will result in error

recommendations.suggestion: Consider if Team Members should be in mainNavItems or if a separate section would be more appropriate
recommendations.rationale: Currently Team Members is at same level as Dashboard/Projects - confirm this reflects desired information architecture

recommendations.suggestion: Test navigation link renders correctly and is clickable in UI
recommendations.rationale: Verify icon displays properly and link navigation functions as expected
